body_html: @teng-li but the the next line "will default to the number of GPUs on your system if not specified" is not correct, and single-node example in line 25 won't do what users expect it to do. I don't mind it not being set (though to me it would still feel more natural if launcher helper took care of using all available GPUs), but it should be reflected in the documentation and examples.

body: @teng-li but the the next line "will default to the number of GPUs on your system if not specified" is not correct, and single-node example in line 25 won't do what users expect it to do. I don't mind it not being set (though to me it would still feel more natural if launcher helper took care of using all available GPUs), but it should be reflected in the documentation and examples.
